oshiSkill.name: 虎視眈々
oshiSkill.description: [Once per turn] Send 1~2 cheers from your archive to 1 of your holomem with #FLOWGLOW that has no cheers attached.

spOshiSkill.name: ニコたんの名を呼ぶがいいさ！
spOshiSkill.description: Usable when your holomem with #FLOWGLOW's ability archives cheer:Deal 30 special damage for each cheer archived by that ability to your opponent's center holomem or collab holomem.

name: Koganei Niko
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

skills.name: にこと出会えたの何かのキセキ
期待せよ 牙で噛まれちゃうシゲキ

name: Koganei Niko
bloomEffect: 人を笑顔にするためならば: You may archive 2 cheers from your stage:Return 1 <Koganei Niko> from your archive to hand.

skills.name: 自分の人生すらも捧げられる
skills.description: You may send the top card of your cheer deck to your <Koganei Niko>.

name: Koganei Niko
collabEffect: FLOW GLOWのお笑い担当: You may send 1 cheer from your archive to your back holomem with #FLOWGLOW.

skills.name: 百折不撓
skills.description: If there are 5 or more cheers on your stage, this Arts gets +20.

name: Koganei Niko
giftEffect: 戯笑の使者: At the start of your Performance Phase, you may archive 1 holomem with #FLOWGLOW from your hand:Send 1 yellow cheer from your archive to your <Koganei Niko>.

skills.name: 虎嘯風生
skills.description: You may archive any number of cheers from this holomem:This Arts gets +40 for each card archived.

name: Mizumiya Su
extraEffect: You may include any number of this holomem in the deck

skills.name: しゅぴしゅわー
skills.description: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, the Baton Pass cheer cost of the holomem currently in your opponent's center position is increased by +1 colorless cheer.

name: Mizumiya Su
collabEffect: FLOW GLOWのえらい宣伝担当: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, the Baton Pass cheer cost of the holomem currently in your opponent's center position is increased by +1 colorless cheer.

skills.name: 愛は時間ですよ
skills.description: If the cheer cost of the targeted holomem's Baton Pass is 2 or more, send the top card of your cheer deck to your back holomem.

name: Mizumiya Su
collabEffect: 感情の伝令者: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, the Baton Pass cheer cost of the holomem currently in your opponent's center position is increased by +3 colorless cheer.

skills.name: スゥイートオブセッション
skills.description: Deal 10 special damage to the targeted holomem times the cheer cost of that holomem's Baton Pass.
